cav: hole，洞
cavity
腔，洞；蛀牙，龋洞；
cavern

 挖空；置…于山洞中；
concave

 凹的；

excavate

挖掘；开凿；挖出；发掘；
 发掘；
excavation
挖掘；开凿；开凿的洞穴（或山路等）；（发掘出来的）古迹；
cave

 （使）塌陷，倒塌；暗中破坏；

abbr.
cavalier 骑士；cavity 洞；cavalry 骑兵；
Chicken Anemia Virus ( CAV ) is the pathogen of ChickenInfectious Anemia ( CIA ) . CAV belongs to Circoviridae.
鸡贫血病毒 ( chickenanemia virus,CAV ) 是鸡传染性贫血病 ( chickeninfectiousanemia,VIA) 的病原,属圆环病毒科(Circoviridae).
Chicken anemia virus ( CAV ) is the pathogen of chicken infectious anemia ( CIA ) . CAV belongs to circoviridae.
鸡贫血病毒 ( chickenanemia virus,CAV ) 是鸡传染性贫血病(chickeninfectiousanemia,VIA) 的病原,属于圆环病毒科 ( Circoviridae ).
The mortality of CAV patients at 1 year, 2 years was 45 %, 75 % respectively.
而心脏移植患者发生CAV后1年的生存率为55%, 2年的生存率为25%.
Western - blot analysis with sera against CAV showed the fusion protein had good specificity.
在 Western -blot免疫 印迹分析中,3个融合蛋白与CAV阳性 血清均能发生特异性反应,表明它们都具有良好的反应性.
However cardiac allograft vasculopathy ( CAV ) is main factor limiting the long - term survival of transplant patients.
心脏移植后患者的生存时间也在不断延长,但长期研究表明:移植心脏血管病变(cardiacallograft vasculopathy,CAV ) 是影响患者长期存活的最主要的原因.
